Topics.Title: Database Connection Issues
Topics.Content:
Database Connection Issues

If you cannot connect to the database, try these steps:

  1. Check that you are connected to the network.
  2. Verify that the MySQL server is running (contact IT if unsure).
  3. Restart the application.
  4. If the problem persists, check the application logs (Menu > View > Application Logs).

Connection Status

The status bar at the bottom of the main window shows the database connection status. Look for a green indicator.

Topics.Title: Part Validation Errors
Topics.Content:
Part Validation Errors

If the system rejects a part number, it may be due to:

  • Invalid Part: Part does not exist in Infor Visual. Verify the part number in Visual.
  • Inactive Part: Part is marked as inactive in Visual. Contact your supervisor.
  • Typo: Double-check the part number for spelling errors.

Barcode Scanning

If using a barcode scanner and parts are not recognized, ensure the scanner is configured correctly and the barcode format matches Visual's part master.

Topics.Title: Slow Performance
Topics.Content:
Slow Performance

If the application is running slowly:

  1. Network: Check your network connection speed.
  2. Large Searches: Narrow down search criteria to reduce result set size.
  3. Close Unused Windows: Close dialogs and forms you are not using.
  4. Restart: Restart the application periodically during long shifts.

Database Load

During peak hours, database queries may take longer due to heavy usage. Be patient or try again in a few minutes.
